Clausal Coordination 1.3 Syntactic features of Coordinators Clause coordinators: restricted to clause-initial position Coordinated clauses: sequentially fixed Coordinators: preceded by a conjunction Coordinators: link clause constituents Coordinators: link subordinate clauses Coordinators: link more than two clauses E.g.: I wonder whether you should speak to him personally or whether it is better to write to him.

text: more than two clauses E.g.: **I** wonder whether **you** should speak to him personally or whether it **is** **better** to write to him.
